title: (x) Scoozi Espresso Bar - custom designed {Chesh}
content:
Hello Folks,   
   
This is a last ditch resort turning to this list. I can't pick this font and think it may be hand done. I'm just after the 'Scoozi' part of this logo below.   
   
 ![Scoozi](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143036im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32511.jpg)   
   
Best regards   
PAUL
author: skyrocket

comments.content: I'm inclined to think it's hand-done, judging by the o's and the way the z connects to the i, but I could be wrong.
Looks hand drawn or very customized. There's no baseline.
